about_the_game:
As the struggle to restore the Valley of Life intensifies, some druids are rising to the forefront as leaders. The Vale of the Wild expansion introduces two new mechanics to Mystic Vale, one of these being the ability to pick the leader that best suits your clan.

Vale of the Wild introduces 54 brand new Advancement Cards and 18 Vale Cards, as well as 8 Leader Cards. Within the 54 advancements, you will discover the second new mechanic to the game – Eclipse Cards.




Eclipse advancements work like regular advancements with the exception that they may be covered by another advancement, but you still get the original advancement’s abilities. This makes your cards even stronger and opens up a whole new realm of combo possibilities!


‘While they are as varied in their approach and nature as the druidic clans themselves, these servants of Gaia all strive for the day when a wicked king’s bitter wrath no longer taints their world.'

Players are dealt two leaders at the start of the game, which they’re able to choose between. Each leader has a different set of abilities and resource benefits, so choose a leader that matches your playstyle! Each leader has a starting side and the ability to be upgraded at a cost of mana to become even more powerful!










Will your leader’s clan lead the way to victory?
